mapper.sql: noticeid, noticetitle, noticetype, noticepicture, noticecontent, noticelasttime, noticelastmodifier
mapper.select:
select
from notice where 1=1
and noticetype in (1,2,3,4,5)
mapper.insert: insert into notice (noticeid, noticetitle, noticetype, noticepicture, noticecontent, noticelasttime, noticelastmodifier) values (#{noticeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noticetitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticecontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticelasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{noticelastmodifier,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update notice

noticetype = #{noticetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where noticeid = #{noticeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
